author: Nermal
title: If you dig keychains and the Scarecrow,
review: The Scarecrow is one of my all time favorite minifigures. The glow-in-the-dark head with red eyes and the torso  sporting a torn robe motif make it one of lego's creepiest figures, too. So naturally, when I heard a keychain of him was coming out, I had to get my hands on one. The overall set is nothing too exciting, just a dude chained to a ring with a dangling brick. But if you dig keychains and the Scarecrow, then this is definitely the set for you.
